Issue.creator: bestbeforetoday
Issue.summary: Allow application to specify function to invoke on instantiate
Issue.description: Currently the SDK is hard-coded to invoke a transaction function called *init* on instantiate. This story uses the function name supplied by the application code, and allows no transaction to be invoked if no transaction name is specified explicitly. This brings the Java SDK behaviour in-line with both the command line and the Node SDK (see FABN-1130|https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABN-1130 ).
